channel.title: Bordom programming
channel.description:
So I got bored and made a notepad... It turned out pretty well... Has the potential of beating the stock microsoft notepad... :P
It includes - saving/loading - an instant clear button - full control over font size and EVERY font you have on YOUR pc (the fonts vary depending on the fonts you have installed) - syntax highlighting - line numbers
Current progress: Adding suggestions, bug fixes - will make a .exe wrapper with an installer :)
Heres a link.
[url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/59761129/NotePad.jar]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/59761129/NotePad.jar[/url]
Any ideas to add to it?
Thanks for the positive feedback and suggestions

item.title: Bordom programming
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Also you can create a batch file to use as the ‘default program’, and have that batch file launch javaw with a jar, and have it use an argument of %1% which is the filename.

Or directly modify the registry

item.title: Bordom programming
item.dc:creator: @Scyth1 Scyth_
item.description:
@Scyth1 wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:27, topic:469160”][quote author=Scyth_ link=topic=586230.msg4164589#msg4164589 date=1353537777]

Make it an application, syntax highlighting?
[/quote]linux hates you too

i use linux and windows, it was a suggestion.

Ill offer both…

You should just keep it as a java application. There’s really no need to turn it into a Windows executable.

You could install it and use it as a default program for text files

Or use notepad++ which has much more functionality. Not saying this isn’t a good program.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Bordom programming
item.dc:creator: @Scyth1 Scyth_
item.description:
@Scyth1 wrote:

[quote=“TiVo, post:15, topic:469160”]This actually looks awesome!

Suggestions:

-Remove “Scyth3” from the title, it makes it look kinda tacky.
-Name it something like IDE++ or something
-Add a credits button for yourself
-MAKE A goto specific line option!
-on the regular mode, give it the ability to bold certain things, and not just bold everything like notepad.
-Change IDE Mode button from a RadioButton to a Checkbox
-Finding moar.[/quote]

Ill do it

Read full topic

-Name it something like IDE++ or something
-Add a credits button for yourself
-MAKE A goto specific line option!
-on the regular mode, give it the ability to bold certain things, and not just bold everything like notepad.
-Change IDE Mode button from a RadioButton to a Checkbox
-Finding moar.
